channel.title: Homes on Daniel Padfield
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Daniel Padfield

item.description: Who am I? I’m an ecologist studying how organisms adapt to change and how ecological processes scale from the very small (metabolism of a single cell) to the very big (ecosystem functions such as primary production). I am interested in how and why communities coexist, and the feedbacks and indirect effects between ecological and evolutionary processes on species interactions within communities. The aim of this blog I aim to use this blog to post helpful R scripts, hopefully describe the work I do in an understandable way and write about the challenges of coping in academia while looking after a chronically ill partner.
